metadata.title: CVE-2017-18013 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
In LibTIFF 4.0.9, there is a Null-Pointer Dereference in the tif_print.cTIFFPrintDirectory function, as demonstrated by a tiffinfo crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.3
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.3
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.3
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.3').
